issues.title: Site Options
issues.body:
- Request: GET /api/1.0/options
- Response:
  JSON object containing the site's name and allowed sign in methods.
  {"success":true,"options":{"siteName":"hackpad","signInMethods":["password","google","facebook"]}}
- Notes:
  This request does not need to be signed using OAuth.

issues.title: List All Pads
issues.body:
- Request: GET /api/1.0/pads/all
- Reponse:
  JSON array of padIds.
  ["C0E68BD495E9","653AF8F23731","485CF7D83139","73B503942C26"]

Returns the list of all pads you the calling user can access.

issues.title: User Creation (Domain Admin Only)
issues.body:
- Request: POST /api/1.0/user/create
- Path Elements:
  - email: Email address of new user.
  - name: Full name of new user
- Reponse:
  JSON object.
  {"success":true}

issues.title: User Deletion (Domain Admin Only)
issues.body:
- Request: POST /api/1.0/user/{user}/remove
- Path Elements:
  - user: Email address of existing user.
- Reponse:
  JSON object.
  {"success":true}

issues.title: User Settings
issues.body:
- Request: POST /api/1.0/user/{user}/settings?{setting}={value}
- Path Elements:
  - user: Email address of existing user.
- Parameters:
  - send-email=true|false: Set whether this user receives email when followed pads are updated.
- Response:
  JSON object.
  {"success":true}

issues.title: Set Pad Options
issues.body:
- Request: POST /api/1.0/pad/{padId}/options?{setting}={value}
- Path Elements:
  - padId: Pad ID
- Parameters:
  - asUser (domain admin only): Email address of existing user to act on behalf of.
  - guestPolicy: Modify pad's guest policy.
  - isModerated: Enable/disable pad moderation.
- Response:
  JSON object.
  {"success":true}
- Notes:
  See above for possible values of guestPolicy.

issues.title: Pad Options
issues.body:
- Request: GET /api/1.0/pad/{padId}/options
- Path Elements:
  - padId: Pad ID
- Parameters:
  asUser (domain admin only): Email address of existing user to act on behalf of.
  Response:
  JSON object with pad and site options. isPublic is only present if isSubdomain is true.
  {"success":true,"options":{"guestPolicy":"deny","isModerated":false},"siteOptions":{"guestPolicies":["deny","allow","link"],"isSubdomain":true,"isPublic":true}}
- Notes:
  Possible values for guestPolicy:
  - allow: "everyone (public)"
  - deny: "invitees only"
  - domain: "everyone on subdomain"
  - link: "anyone with the link"

issues.title: Revoke Access
issues.body:
- Request: POST /api/1.0/pad/{padId}/revoke-access/{user}
- Path Elements:
  - padId: Pad ID
  - user: Email address of existing user.
- Parameters:
  asUser (domain admin only): Email address of existing user to act on behalf of.
  Response:
  JSON object.
  {"success":true}

issues.title: Revert Pad
issues.body:
- Request: POST /api/1.0/pad/{padId}/revert-to/{revision}
- Path Elements:
  - padId: Pad ID
  - revision: Revision pad's content will be reverted to
- Parameters:
  asUser (domain admin only): Email address of existing user to act on behalf of.
  Response:
  JSON object.
  {"success":true}

issues.title: Pad Revisions
issues.body:
- Request: GET /api/1.0/pad/{padId}/revisions
- Path Elements:
  - padId: Pad ID
- Parameters:
  - asUser (domain admin only): Email address of existing user to act on behalf of.
- Response:
  JSON array of objects containing revision information.
  [{"htmlDiff":"","timestamp":1356385020173,"startRev":0,"endRev":2,"authors":["user@hackpad.test"]}]

issues.title: List Updated Pads (Domain Admins Only)
issues.body:
- Request: GET /api/1.0/edited-since/{timestamp}
- Path Elements:
  - timestamp: Number of seconds since midnight Jan 1, 1970
- Response:
  JSON array of pad IDs. Only the oldest 1000 pads are returned.
  ["C0E68BD495E9","653AF8F23731","485CF7D83139","73B503942C26"]

issues.title: Search For Pads
issues.body: - Request: GET /api/1.0/search?q={query}[&start={start}][&limit={limit}] - Parameters: - q: Text to search for - start (optional): Skip the first {start} results (default: 0) - limit (optional): Return {limit} results (default: 10) - asUser (domain admin only): Email address of existing user to act on behalf of. - Response: JSON array of objects containing pad ID, title, and a brief HTML snippet with search terms highlighted in bold: [{"title":"API 1.0 Docs","id":"C0E68BD495E9","snippet":"array of objects containing pad Id, title, and a"}]
